ValidationRule.description: Field: 'Patient MAiD Request Date' Rule: This date must be after Jan 1st 2016 and before or equal to todays date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName ='MAiD_Case', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Error_Log'), Patient_MAiD_Request_Date__c > TODAY() || Patient_MAiD_Request_Date__c < DATE(2016,01,01) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Patient MAiD Request Date must be after Jan 1st 2016 Or before/equal to today's date
